author: Navyashree B K
text:
Option trading! 

Support = highest put OI(open interest)
Resistance = highest call OI(open interest)

author: Navyashree B K
text:
In the money, 

ITM 
If strike price< stock price (Bullish) 

OTM 
If strike price > stock price(Bearish)

author: Navyashree B K
Navyashree B K
text:
Good morning! 

RSI lesser than 40. Monthly, weekly, daily - sell 
RSI greater than 60. Monthly, weekly, daily - buy 

Between 40 to 60 don't do anything if you are a beginner. https://t.co/6dOrfhIQ9c

author: Navyashree B K
text:
Do you want to master the stock market ? 

Therortical 
1. Research more 
2. Learn from other mistakes
3. Read quarterly results more not news 

Practical
4. Invest slowly
5. Patience to hold 
6. Make a note when you will sell before investing
7. Risk/ fixed stop loss

shut up ! And enjoy now 😁
